uuid.description: UUID of the account.

accountType.description: Type of the account. Default = BANK_ACCOUNT

closedAccount.description: Flag to show if account is opened (false) or closed (true). Default = false.

closingDate.description: Date as of which the account is closed. Default: system date.

hidden.description: Flag to show if the data shall be hidden in all lists. Default = false.

openingDate.description: Date when the account was opened. Default: system date.

nonResident.description: Flag to show if the account is a non resident account (true) or a resident account (false). Default = false.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

currency.title: ReferenceModel
currency.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

company.title: ReferenceModel
company.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

branch.title: ReferenceModel
branch.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

defaultGroup.title: ReferenceModel
defaultGroup.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

bankStatementLayout.description: Bank statement layout of the account.

banStructure.description: Type of the BAN. Default = LBAN_1_STRUCTURE

value.description: Account Id value. Account Id length depends on country. IBAN value should include country code and control key.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

establishment.title: ReferenceModel
establishment.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

bankAccountIDs.description: Additional BANs for the same account.

banStructure.description: Type of the BAN. Default = LBAN_1_STRUCTURE

value.description: Account Id value. Account Id length depends on country. IBAN value should include country code and control key.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

establishment.title: ReferenceModel
establishment.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

country.title: ReferenceModel
country.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

zipCode.description: ZIP code. Note: the max field length depends on the Country setup. The default value is 10c but a smaller value may be defined in your Country setup.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

calendar.title: ReferenceModel
calendar.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

zbaGenerator.description: Flag to show if account can generate ZBA interco cash flows (true) or no (false). Default = false.

zbaIdentifier.description: Code that used by the bank to identify this account in bank statements.

generateZBAFlow.description: Defines how many flows shall be generated for each ZBA actual.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

settlementAccount.title: ReferenceModel
settlementAccount.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

counterpartySettlementAccount.title: ReferenceModel
counterpartySettlementAccount.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

chartOfAccounts.title: ReferenceModel
chartOfAccounts.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

glAccount.title: ReferenceModel
glAccount.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

internalAccountCode.description: Code that represents the current account in the internal chart of GL accounts.

includeInGLReconciliation.description: Flag to show if the current account should be considered in module GR (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerBankStatementsFrom.description: Date as of which bank statements should be considered in the GL reconciliation process.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

currency.title: ReferenceModel
currency.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

initialAccountingBalanceDate.description: Date of the Initial accounting balance.

userZone1.description: Free field whose type (Alphanumeric, Numeric, Date, List) is defined in the application setup. The imported value must be consistent with the field type. And the total length across all user zone values must be of 250 characters max.

userZone2.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

userZone3.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

userZone4.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

userZone5.description: Free field. Same behavior as field User zone 1.

considerOneDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “one day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerTwoDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “two day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerThreeDayFloatTransactions.description: Flag to show if “three day float” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

considerInvestmentPositionTransactions.description: Flag to show if “investment position” bank transactions should be considered when calculating the account initial balance (true) or no (false). Default = false.

integrateEndOfDayStatements.description: Flag to show if End-of-day bank statements should be integrated (true) or no (false). Default = true.

integrateIntradayStatements.description: Flag to show if Intraday bank statements should be integrated (true) or no (false). Default = false.

cutOffTime.description: Time until which the intraday bank statements should be considered.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

interestBearing.description: Flag to show if the account is interest bearing (true) or no (false). Default = false.

centrallyManaged.description: Flag to show if the account is managed by Central Treasury (true) or no (false). Default = false.

reconcilerName.description: Name of the user in charge of the account reconciliation

signatoryUsers.description: List of users who have authority over the account.

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

items.title: ReferenceModel
items.description: Represents possible identifiers for resource. Should be provided at least one identifier (code or uuid). In the case of providing uuid and code, uuid will be used for resolving the reference.

establishments.description: List of the multiple establishments to which the current account belongs.

domesticTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for Domestic transfer

internationalTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for International transfer

maturityTransfer.description: Issuer number to be used for Maturity transfer

domesticDirectDebit.description: Issuer number to be used for Domestic direct debit

internationalDirectDebit.description: Issuer number to be used for International direct debit

payablesDrafts.description: Issuer number to be used for Payables drafts

receivablesDrafts.description: Issuer number to be used for Receivables drafts

accountAvailableForPayments.description: Flag to show if account is available for payments (true) or no (false). Default = true.

bankReportingPolicy.description: Real Bank account used for Checks. Default = CURRENT_ACCOUNT

uuid.description: UUID identifier. Has priority over the code

oneTime.description: Flag to show if the account has One-time correspondent (true) or no (false).

correspondentBIC.description: BIC value of the One-time correspondent.
